wikipedia_page.main: Jean Watson (born 29 October 1960) is a British cross-country skier. She competed in two events at the 1988 Winter Olympics.

response: Jean Watson is an American nurse theorist and nursing professor who is best known for her theory of human caring. She is the author of numerous texts, including Nursing: The Philosophy and Science of Caring. Watson's research on caring has been incorporated into education and patient care at hundreds of nursing schools and healthcare facilities across the world.
